posts.post_content: How many black trample creatures are there at 5cc or less? And of those what, 6, how many are more useful then this? 1, maybe 2. Black Carriage isn't a great card, but its in a colour that doesn't get trample without a huge casting cost most of the time and its drawback is one that plays into the colours strengths. It's at worst a decent card that has a certain niche, nowhere near the worst card ever, seeing as its not even the worst card in its colour in its set.
